title.narrative: Grid-Connected RE Development Support (ADERC) - Transmission Phase I

description.narrative: SREP funds will support the construction of additional SIEPAC (Central American Electrical Interconnection System) reinforcements in the northern part of the country. These investments will support the national transmission system to increase the energy commercialization in the regional electricity market and increase the share of renewable energy in the generation matrix

participating-org.narrative: Inter-American Development Bank, Inter-American Investment Corporation and Multilateral Investment Fund

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
